items.name: Quick Start guide
items.description: A quick start guide for laboratory personnel

items.name: RESTful JSON API
items.description: RESTful JSON API for SENAITE LIMS, that allows to Create, Read and Update through http GET/POST requests.

items.name: SQL Multiplex
items.description: Multiplex for SENAITE LIMS that allows to keep a MySQL or MariaDB database in-sync with SENAITE's database.

items.name: LIS1-A/ASTM E1381 (RS-232)
items.description: Tool for interfacing systems compliant with ASTM E1381-02, LIS1-A to SENAITE LIMS across the serial RS-232 port.

name: Build and extend
description: Technical documentation of other packages from SENAITE ecosystem

items.name: The core
items.description: Main logic, contents, behavior and user interface for SENAITE LIMS.

items.name: Asynchronous tasks
items.description: Asynchronous tasks for SENAITE LIMS to better handle concurrent actions and processes when the workload is high.

items.name: Panic ranges
items.description: Integration of panic ranges (or life-threatening conditions) in Analysis Specifications
